DialogContent.Description: XIVPlan is a tool for quickly diagramming raid strategies for Final Fantasy XIV, inspired by<0>RaidPlan.io</0> and <1>FF14工具箱</1>。
DialogContent.OpenSource: XIVPlan is open source on<0> GitHub </0>. If you find a bug or have other feedback, please create a<1>issue</1>!

DirtyProvider.NAV_LOCK_MESSAGE: Are you sure you want to leave? Your unsaved changes will be lost.

DialogContent.Arena_Description: Edit the appearance of the arena here.
DialogContent.Icons_Description: Drag markers and status effect icons onto the arena.
DialogContent.Draw_Description: Draw freeform objects on the scene.
DialogContent.Properties_Description: Select an object, then edit its properties here.
DialogContent.Scene_Description: Displays a list of all objects in the scene. Drag and drop to adjust layering order.

FileDialogFileSystem.SaveFileSystem_description: Click "Save as" below to save the plan to your computer.
FileDialogFileSystem.FileSystemNotSupportedMessage1: Your browser does not support the experimental File System API. You can download the plan as an <0>.xivplan</0> file, then drag and drop it onto the page to open it again.
FileDialogFileSystem.FileSystemNotSupportedMessage2: To save files locally, use a Chromium-based browser such as <0>Edge</0> or <1>Chrome</1>.
